name: api_physics2d_BoxCollider2D
description: Collider for 2D physics representing an axis-aligned rectangle.

properties.name: autoTiling
properties.description: Determines whether the BoxCollider2D's shape is automatically updated based on a SpriteRenderer's tiling properties.

properties.name: edgeRadius
properties.description: Controls the radius of all edges created by the collider.

properties.name: size
properties.description: The width and height of the rectangle.

properties.name: CanContact
properties.description: This method determines if both Colliders can ever come into contact.

properties.name: Cast
properties.description: Casts the Collider shape into the Scene starting at the Collider position ignoring the Collider itself.

properties.name: ClosestPoint
properties.description: Returns a point on the perimeter of this Collider that is closest to the specified position.

properties.name: CreateMesh
properties.description: Creates a planar Mesh that is identical to the area defined by the Collider2D geometry.

properties.name: Distance
properties.description: Calculates the minimum separation of this collider against another collider.

properties.name: GetContacts
properties.description: Retrieves all contact points for this Collider.

properties.name: GetShapeBounds
properties.description: Retrieves a list of Bounds for all PhysicsShape2D created by this Collider2D, and returns the combined Bounds of the retrieved list.

properties.name: GetShapeHash
properties.description: Generates a simple hash value based upon the geometry of the Collider2D.

properties.name: GetShapes
properties.description: Gets all the PhysicsShape2D used by the Collider2D.

properties.name: IsTouching
properties.description: Check whether this collider is touching the collider or not.

properties.name: IsTouchingLayers
properties.description: Checks whether this collider is touching any colliders on the specified layerMask or not.

properties.name: Overlap
properties.description: Get a list of all Colliders that overlap this Collider.

properties.name: OverlapPoint
properties.description: Check if a collider overlaps a point in space.

properties.name: Raycast
properties.description: Casts a ray into the Scene that starts at the Collider position and ignores the Collider itself.

properties.name: BroadcastMessage
properties.description: Calls the method named methodName on every MonoBehaviour in this game object or any of its children.

properties.name: CompareTag
properties.description: Checks the GameObject's tag against the defined tag.

properties.name: GetComponent
properties.description: Gets a reference to a component of type T on the same GameObject as the component specified.
